name: Helium
long_description:
Helium uses AI to build better mobile upsell flows. 

Growth teams use Helium's visual editor to create their in-app paywalls, then our ML system runs automated tests on messaging, experience, and pricing to drive conversion. 

For example, a social app with 20M MAU uses Helium to test value propositions and pricing across dozens of countries.

We've earned $100M+ building AI conversion tools for Uber and Meta, and started Helium to help other companies do the same.
one_liner: AI to build better upsell flows
